SqlString.String: SELECT @Src_Doc_Type Src_Doc_Type, @Src_Doc_Unit Src_Doc_Unit, @Src_Doc_Num Src_Doc_Num, T.RCV_WAREH_ID STORE_NBR, T.BBN_NUM IDT_NUM, NULL IN_STORE_DATE, NULL DISTRO_TYPE, NULL PO_NBR, NULL START_SHIP_DATE ,NULL SHPMT_NBR FROM BBN T WHERE T.CANCELLED = 'F' AND T.BBN_NUM = @Src_Doc_Num AND T.VENDER_ID = @Src_Doc_Unit;

SELECT @Src_Doc_Type Src_Doc_Type, @Src_Doc_Unit Src_Doc_Unit, @Src_Doc_Num Src_Doc_Num, DECODE(NVL(T.IS_LOWER_ORDEDR, 'F'), 'T', T.LOWER_SHOP_ID, T.RCV_WAREH_ID) STORE_NBR, T.TFO_NUM IDT_NUM, T.INVSG_DATE IN_STORE_DATE, NULL DISTRO_TYPE, NULL PO_NBR, NULL START_SHIP_DATE ,NULL SHPMT_NBR FROM TFO T WHERE T.CANCELLED = 'F' AND T.TFO_NUM = @Src_Doc_Num AND T.UNIT_ID = @Src_Doc_Unit;

SELECT @Src_Doc_Type Src_Doc_Type, @Src_Doc_Unit Src_Doc_Unit, @Src_Doc_Num Src_Doc_Num, T.RCV_WAREH_ID STORE_NBR, T.TBN_NUM IDT_NUM, T.INVSG_TIME IN_STORE_DATE ,NULL DISTRO_TYPE ,NULL PO_NBR ,NULL START_SHIP_DATE ,NULL SHPMT_NBR FROM TBN T WHERE T.CANCELLED = 'F' AND T.TBN_NUM = @Src_Doc_Num AND T.VENDER_ID = @Src_Doc_Unit;

SELECT @Src_Doc_Type Src_Doc_Type, @Src_Doc_Unit Src_Doc_Unit, @Src_Doc_Num Src_Doc_Num, DECODE(NVL(S.IS_LOWER_ORDER, 'F') , 'T', S.LOWER_SHOP_ID, T.RCV_WAREH_ID) STORE_NBR, DECODE(S.PROVIDE_TYPE, '11', 'OTB' || S.VENDER_ID || S.FUC_NUM, '') PO_NBR, DECODE(S.PROVIDE_TYPE, '11', '2', '1') DISTRO_TYPE, S.FUC_NUM IDT_NUM, T.ORD_AT IN_STORE_DATE, T.BATCH_DATE START_SHIP_DATE ,null SHPMT_NBR FROM FUC_ORD T, FUC S WHERE T.FUC_NUM = S.FUC_NUM AND T.VENDER_ID = S.VENDER_ID AND S.CANCELLED = 'F' AND T.CANCELLED = 'F' AND T.FUC_ORD_NUM = @Src_Doc_Num AND T.VENDEE_ID = @Src_Doc_Unit;

SELECT @Src_Doc_Type Src_Doc_Type, @Src_Doc_Unit Src_Doc_Unit, @Src_Doc_Num Src_Doc_Num, DECODE(S.LOW_IDT_FLAG, 'T', S.LOW_SHOP_ID, S.RCV_WAREH_ID) STORE_NBR, S.IDT_NUM, T.ADM_AT IN_STORE_DATE, CASE WHEN s.cit_type ='MO' THEN 'MFO'|| a.agent_id || a.mfo_num WHEN s.cit_type='PS' THEN 'API'|| b.vendee_id || s.pid_num END PO_NBR, CASE WHEN s.cit_type ='MO' THEN DECODE(a.ACROSS_FLAG,'T','2','1') WHEN s.cit_type='PS' THEN DECODE(b.ACROSS_FLAG,'T','2','1') END DISTRO_TYPE, d.unit_short_id||c.grn_num SHPMT_NBR , null START_SHIP_DATE FROM ADN T INNER JOIN IDT S ON (T.VENDEE_ID = S.VENDEE_ID AND T.IDT_NUM = S.IDT_NUM) LEFT JOIN MFO A ON a.agent_id=s.vender_id AND a.mfo_num=s.pid_num AND a.cancelled='F' LEFT JOIN PUO b ON b.VENDEE_ID = S.VENDER_ID AND b.IDT_NUM = S.PID_NUM AND b.cancelled='F' LEFT JOIN GRN c ON c.SRC_DOC_TYPE = 'PUO' AND c.src_unit_id=s.vender_id AND c.src_doc_num=b.puo_num AND c.cancelled='F' AND c.struck='F' LEFT JOIN Sys_Unit d ON c.wareh_id=d.unit_id where T.VENDER_ID=@Src_Doc_Unit AND T.ADN_NUM=@Src_Doc_Num;

SELECT A.UNIT_ID,A.GDN_NUM,A.SRC_DOC_TYPE,A.SRC_UNIT_ID Src_Doc_Unit,A.SRC_DOC_NUM,A.WIF_NUM FROM GDN A WHERE A.NEED_SEND = '20' AND A.PROGRESS = 'CN' AND A.STRUCK = 'F' AND A.CANCELLED = 'F' AND A.IMPORT_WMOS_DMODE = 'DST' AND A.WIF_NUM IS NOT NULL and rownum<1000;

SELECT --WMOS_DISTRO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, D.UNIT_SHORT_ID WHSE, A.WIF_NUM DISTRO_NBR, CASE WHEN A.SRC_DOC_TYPE='FON' THEN (SELECT T.FUC_LINE_ID FROM FUC_DTL_LINE T WHERE T.FUC_NUM ='' AND T.VENDER_ID = B.UNIT_ID AND T.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID) END SEQ_NBR,
'1' DISTRO_TYPE, '?' PO_NBR, '?' STORE_NBR, 'MB' CO, '001' DIV, C.PROD_PROP SEASON, C.PROD_SORT || C.PROD_STYLE STYLE, C.COLOR , C.EDITION SEC_DIM, C.SPEC SIZE_DESC, '?' SHPMT_NBR, '?' STAT_CODE, B.QUANTITY REQD_QTY, /* B.PROD_ID ,*/ '?' DISTRO_BREAK_ATTR,
A.SRC_DOC_TYPE ORDER_TYPE, NVL(E.UNIT_SHORT_ID,'MB01') RET_NAME, 0 WAVE_PROC_TYPE, 0 ERROR_SEQ_NBR, 0 PROC_STAT_CODE, 'MB' CARTON_LABEL_TYPE, '51' CARTON_CUBNG_INDIC,
'Y' REF_FIELD_3, 'vBATCH_DATE' START_SHIP_DATE, SYSDATE CREATE_DATE_TIME, SYSDATE MOD_DATE_TIME, 'ERP' USER_ID, ''PICK_LOCN_ASSIGN_TYPE, 'vDISTRO_TYPE 'MERCH_TYPE, 'vDISTRO_TYPE' MERCH_GROUP, 'vDISTRO_TYPE' INVN_TYPE, 'vINVSG_AT' IN_STORE_DATE, A.UNIT_ID || A.GDN_NUM REF_FIELD_1, TO_CHAR(A.DOC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REF_FIELD_2, A.RCV_UNIT_ID ASSORT_NBR, G.BRAND_CODE STORE_DEPT,
A.GDN_NUM EVENT_CODE, '' UN_NBR FROM GDN A, GDN_DTL B, PRODUCT C, SYS_UNIT D, SYS_UNIT E, PROD_CLS F, SYS_BRAND G WHERE A.UNIT_ID = B.UNIT_ID AND A.GDN_NUM = B.GDN_NUM AND B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.WAREH_ID = D.UNIT_ID(+) AND A.TSP_COM_ID = E.UNIT_ID(+) AND C.PROD_PROP = F.PROD_PROP AND C.PROD_SORT = F.PROD_SORT AND C.PROD_STYLE = F.PROD_STYLE AND F.BRAND_ID = G.BRAND_ID(+) /* AND A.GDN_NUM = pGDN_NUM AND A.UNIT_ID = pUNIT_ID;*/

SELECT a.unit_id,a.gdn_num,COUNT(1) LineCount FROM MTSBW.GDN A INNER JOIN MTSBW.GDN_DTL B ON A.UNIT_ID=B.UNIT_ID AND A.GDN_NUM=B.GDN_NUM WHERE (A.SAP_FLAG = '2' OR A.SAP_FLAG = '1') AND ROWNUM <= 1000 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MTSBW.SYS_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_CLASS = 'SAP_UNIT_TO' AND A.WAREH_ID = B.CODE) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MTSBW.SYS_CODE C WHERE C.CODE_CLASS = 'SAP_DELIV_MODE' AND A.DELIV_MODE = C.CODE) GROUP BY A.UNIT_ID,A.GDN_NUM HAVING(COUNT(1)<=4000);
